name: Do I need more than one survey project for a multilingual questionnaire?
title: Do I need more than one survey project for a multilingual questionnaire?
body:
Overview

This article addresses the question of whether multiple survey projects are needed to create a multilingual questionnaire. It provides a concise answer and explains how to handle multilingual surveys within a single project.

 

Information

Creating a Multilingual Questionnaire

You can create a multilingual questionnaire using a single survey project. This approach simplifies the process of managing multiple languages within your survey.

However, please note that you will need to manually translate the survey in the other language, as there is no feature to allow automatic localization.

 

FAQ

Do I need more than one survey project for a multilingual questionnaire?

No. You can create a multilingual questionnaire using a single survey project.
